LEVEL 25
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Card & Adventure Video Games: Monster Rancher Explorer Archive (Game Boy Color): Strategy: LEVEL 25
By Y.K.TAN on Wednesday, May 15, 2002 - 12:07 am:

LEVEL 25

Move two steps left at the start of the stage,and create a box left on you and jump on it,and smash the box above it,beware of the joker monster coming. After that come down the box and go all the way left. Than move one step right,and facing left create a box,and climb up to the next ledge when the joker's not there. At the second ledge,destroy the top boxes and climb up to the third ledge,still be careful of those red spinning monsters and jokers. At the third ledge,destroy a box,so that the spinning mosnters will fall right down to the bottom(This stage's confusing,can't say much more.) The box that you should destroy is where you can see a "gap" from the above ledge meaning that the monster will fall from there,so destroy the box below the gap. And climb all your way up. At the uppest ledge,wait for the next batch of spinning monster to fall,and than (above you a box is a disk fragment.) create a box to reach the UPPEST ledge,and go forward and getting the key,mind the joker's and go a few ledge downwards to the exit.
